meanings.definition: An article or substance that is manufactured or refined for sale.
meanings.sent1: The store sells various products like toys and clothes.
meanings.sent2: She carefully displayed the new products on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog claimed he could sell products better than any human.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a wellspring of unique products.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread was one of the store's most enticing products.

meanings.definition: The result or outcome of a process or action.
meanings.sent1: The success of the project was one of the best products of their teamwork.
meanings.sent2: Hard work and dedication are essential for achieving positive products.
meanings.sent3: The magician's final product was a rabbit in a hat.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a product of hours of preparation and practice.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children playing outside was a delightful product of the sunny weather.
